verifyShipper.title: Verify Shipper
verifyShipper.scanCOI: Scan or enter the COI Number found on the LN2 shipper label.

verifyShipper.scanCOICommercial: Scan or enter the COI Number found on the LN2 Packing insert.
verifyShipper.numberOfBags: Please enter the number of bags received.

shippingRecieptChecklist.title: Shipment Receipt Checklist
shippingRecieptChecklist.description: Complete this section prior to opening the LN2 shipper. Document the checks performed, actions taken, and the condition of the shipment upon arrival at the site.

labels.caseIntactEmea: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact the Vein to Vein team.
labels.caseIntact: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact Janssen CSC logistics.
labels.caseIntactCommercial: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact the Vein to Vein team.
labels.caseIntactCc: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact your Janssen Cell Therapy Coordinator for further instructions
labels.alarmRecieved: Was there a temperature out-of-range alarm received? If yes, meaning a Temperature Out-of-Range has occurred, proceed with unpacking immediately and then contact CDT to complete a TOR report.
labels.kitPouch: Is the Consignee kit pouch included with the shipper?
labels.shipperLabel: Is the shipper label included with the shipper?
labels.shipperLabelEmea: Is the packing insert included with the shipper?
labels.shipperLabelCommercial: Is the packing insert included with the shipper?
labels.evoIsNumber: Please enter the last 4-digits of the EVO-IS Number on the LN2 shipper lid.
labels.evoListenedAWB: Does the EVO-IS Number listed on the Air Waybill match the EVO-IS Number on the LN2 shipper lid?
labels.redTamper: Is the Red Wire Tamper Seal in place for the LN2 shipper lid?
labels.sealNumber: Please enter the Tamper Seal Number on LN2 shipper lid.
labels.sealNumberonAWB: Does the Tamper Seal Number listed on the Air Waybill match the Tamper Seal Number on the LN2 shipper lid?

transferProductStorage.title: Transfer Product To Storage
transferProductStorage.description: Remove cassette 1 and bag 1 from the LN2 shipper and scan the LN2 shipper label to capture the time of this step. Then transfer cassette 1 and bag 1 to storage and scan to capture the time of this step. Please note, it is important to place the CAR-T product in storage (liquid nitrogen freezer) as soon as possible upon receipt and all checks have been performed/verified. The frozen bag is fragile. Always handle the cassette and frozen bag with care and control at all times.
transferProductStorage.description2: Remove cassette 1 and bag 1 from the LN2 shipper and scan the LN2 shipper label to capture the time of this step. Then transfer cassette 1 and bag 1 to storage and scan to capture the time of this step. Please note, it is important to place the IP in storage (liquid nitrogen freezer) as soon as possible upon receipt and all checks have been performed/verified. The frozen bag is fragile. Always handle the cassette and frozen bag with care and control at all times.
transferProductStorage.description3: Remove cassette 1 and bag 1 from the LN2 shipper and scan the LN2 Packing insert to capture the time of this step. Then transfer cassette 1 and bag 1 to storage and scan to capture the time of this step. Please note, it is important to place the CAR-T product in storage (liquid nitrogen freezer) as soon as possible upon receipt and all checks have been performed/verified. The frozen bag is fragile. Always handle the cassette and frozen bag with care and control at all times.

labels.coiScanLN2: Scan or enter the COI number on the LN2 shipper label.

labels.coiScanCassete: Scan or enter the COI Bag Identifier on the cassette.

labels.inverstProduct: Confirm investigational product cassette(s) were not exposed to ambient temperature greater than 3 minutes.
labels.cartProduct: Confirm CAR-T product cassette(s) were not exposed to ambient temperature greater than 3 minutes.

labels.expectedCondition: Is each cassette in the expected condition (e.g. no cassette damage, label adhered)? If the cassette is not in expected condition, please contact CSC or logistics contact by telephone for further instructions.
labels.expectedConditionCcdcQr: Is each bag and cassette in expected condition (e.g. no cassette damage, label adhered)?  If bag(s) or cassette(s) is not in expected condition, please contact Janssen Vein to Vein team for further instructions.
labels.expectedConditionEmeaWDC: Is each bag(s) and cassette(s) in expected condition (e.g. no cassette damage, label adhered)? If bag(s) or cassette(s) is not in expected condition, please contact the Vein to Vein team.
labels.expectedConditionEmeaWDCCcDcQr: Is each bag and cassette in expected condition (e.g. no cassette damage, label adhered)?  If bag(s) or cassette(s) is not in expected condition, please contact Janssen Vein to Vein team for further instructions.
labels.expectedConditionEmeaCCLPDC: Is each bag(s) and cassette(s) in expected condition (e.g. no cassette damage, label adhered)? If bag(s) or cassette(s) is not in expected condition, please contact the Vein to Vein team.
labels.vaporPhaseEmeaCCDC: Has the CAR-T product been placed into storage as per the cassette label: Store at ≤-120°C (-184°F), vapor phase of liquid nitrogen? This should be done even if there are any issues with the shipment.
labels.vaporPhase: Has the investigational product been placed into storage as per the cassette label: Store at ≤-120°C (-184°F), vapor phase of liquid nitrogen? This should be done even if there are any issues with the shipment.
labels.expireDate: Please enter the expiry date as last 8 digits of the SEC-Product Identification Sequence (SEC-PIS) Number (Format needed: 12/JAN/2015 = 20150112). Please do not overwrite the pre-populated first 11 digits or you will not be able to proceed.
labels.expityMatch: Does the Expiry match with notification email sent by CDT?

transferShipper.title: Transfer Product To Shipper
transferShipper.decription: IMPORTANT: Please place the investigational product into the liquid nitrogen shipper as soon as possible and ensure all checks have been performed and verified. The frozen bag is fragile. Always handle the cassette and frozen bag with care and control at all times.

labels.containerDamaged: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact Janssen CSC logistics.
